languages.text: {n}Лицо Кибеллы искажает страдание, но она стискивает кулаки и кивает.{/n} "Надлежит призвать смерть в сей чертог. И восславить Его".
{n}Agony distorts Kibellah's features, but she clenches her fists and nods.{/n} "We must summon death to these halls. And glorify Him."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Кибеллы искажает страдание, но она стискивает кулаки и кивает.{/n} "Надлежит призвать смерть в сей чертог. И восславить Его".

{n}Agony distorts Kibellah's features, but she clenches her fists and nods.{/n} "We must summon death to these halls. And glorify Him."

languages.text: {n}La détresse déforme les traits de Kibellah, mais elle serre les poings et acquiesce résolument.{/n} « Nous devons invoquer la mort en ces salles. Et Lui rendre gloire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Agony distorts Kibellah's features, but she clenches her fists and nods.{/n} "We must summon death to these halls. And glorify Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}La détresse déforme les traits de Kibellah, mais elle serre les poings et acquiesce résolument.{/n} « Nous devons invoquer la mort en ces salles. Et Lui rendre gloire. »

languages.text: {n}La agonía altera el rostro de Kibellah, pero aprieta los puños y asiente.{/n} «Traigamos la muerte a estos salones. Regocijémonos en Su gloria».
languages.original_text: {n}Agony distorts Kibellah's features, but she clenches her fists and nods.{/n} "We must summon death to these halls. And glorify Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}La agonía altera el rostro de Kibellah, pero aprieta los puños y asiente.{/n} «Traigamos la muerte a estos salones. Regocijémonos en Su gloria».

languages.text: {n}キベラは苦しそうに顔を歪ませるが、拳を握りしめてうなずく。{/n}「この広間に死を呼ばないと。そしてあの方を称えましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Agony distorts Kibellah's features, but she clenches her fists and nods.{/n} "We must summon death to these halls. And glorify Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは苦しそうに顔を歪ませるが、拳を握りしめてうなずく。{/n}「この広間に死を呼ばないと。そしてあの方を称えましょう」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈的脸痛苦地扭曲着，但她依然握紧了拳头，点了点头。{/n}“我们必须将死亡召唤到圣殿之中，祭拜不死神皇。”
languages.original_text: {n}Agony distorts Kibellah's features, but she clenches her fists and nods.{/n} "We must summon death to these halls. And glorify Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈的脸痛苦地扭曲着，但她依然握紧了拳头，点了点头。{/n}“我们必须将死亡召唤到圣殿之中，祭拜不死神皇。”

languages.text: {n}Pein verzerrt Kibellahs Gesichtszüge, doch sie ballt die Fäuste und nickt.{/n} "Wir müssen den Tod in diese Hallen rufen. Und ihn verherrlichen."
languages.original_text: {n}Agony distorts Kibellah's features, but she clenches her fists and nods.{/n} "We must summon death to these halls. And glorify Him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pein verzerrt Kibellahs Gesichtszüge, doch sie ballt die Fäuste und nickt.{/n} "Wir müssen den Tod in diese Hallen rufen. Und ihn verherrlichen."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın yüz hatları, ızdırapla eğrilip bükülüyor. Fakat yumruğunu sıkarak başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bu salona ölümü davet edip O'nu yüceltmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Agony distorts Kibellah's features, but she clenches her fists and nods.{/n} "We must summon death to these halls. And glorify Him."
